name: Data-science-resources
tagline: All the resources you could ever want for doing data science.
body:
# Heads-Up! Lots of great resources below.
This is the [Boulder Data Science](www.meetup.com/BoulderDataScience/) repo for all of the best resources we find across the web. From learning the basics to hacking on projects and getting jobs, it's all here.

### Machine Learning in Python
- [scikit-learn documentation](http://scikit-learn.org/stable/): {{ description here }}

### Neural Networks / Deep Learning
- [Neural Networks and Deep Learning](http://neuralnetworksanddeeplearning.com/chap1.html)
- [Google / Udacity Deep Learning Course](https://www.udacity.com/course/deep-learning--ud730)
- [Deep Learning, NLP, and Representations](http://colah.github.io/posts/2014-07-NLP-RNNs-Representations/)

### Data Visualization
- [Setosa.io](http://setosa.io/)

### Auto-ML
- [The Automated Statistician](http://www.automaticstatistician.com/static/assets/auto-report-affairs.pdf)

## Learning the Foundations
### Statistics
- [Introduction to Statistical Learning](http://www-bcf.usc.edu/~gareth/ISL/ISLR%20First%20Printing.pdf)
- [Elements of Statistical Learning](https://web.stanford.edu/~hastie/local.ftp/Springer/OLD/ESLII_print4.pdf)

### Maths
- [Singular Value Decomposition](https://www.metacademy.org/graphs/concepts/singular_value_decomposition)

### Programming in Python
- [Learn Python the Hard Way](http://learnpythonthehardway.org/)
- [Anaconda](https://www.continuum.io/downloads)
- [Jupyter Notebooks](http://jupyter.org/)

### GitHub
- [The Git Book](https://git-scm.com/book/)
- [Try Git](https://try.github.io)
- [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/)
- [GitHub Pages & Jekyll](http://jmcglone.com/guides/github-pages/)

### Get in Touch
Got a stellar resource to add to this list? Send us a message on the [BDS Meetup page](), or submit a pull request to the 'gh-pages' branch of [this resources repo]().
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
